tool_description:
Get detailed team and schedule data, real-time scores, and betting odds for top US football, basketball, baseball, and hockey leagues:
 • NFL
 • NBA
 • MLB
 • NHL
 • NCAAF
 • NCAAB

Documentation: https://sportspagefeeds.com/documentation

Looking for bulk historical data?  Send us a message and let us know your needs.
name: Sportspage Feeds
title: Sportspage Feeds

api_list.name: Rankings
api_list.description: League rankings (currently supports NCAAF and NCAAB)

api_list.name: Teams
api_list.description: Returns a list of teams within a specified league, conference, or division.

required_parameters.name: league
required_parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

optional_parameters.name: conference
optional_parameters.description: A conference within the specified league

optional_parameters.name: division
optional_parameters.description: A division within the specified conference

api_list.name: Game By ID
api_list.description: Returns a specific game based on its ID.

api_list.name: Games

optional_parameters.name: odds
optional_parameters.description: A comma-separated filter to select games with one or more of the following odds types: \\\\\\\"spread\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"moneyline\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"total\\\\\\\", or \\\\\\\"any\\\\\\\"

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: A team participating in one or more games

optional_parameters.name: division
optional_parameters.description: A division within the specified conference

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: One or two (comma-separated) YYYY-MM-DD- or ISO-formatted dates

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: The number of game results to skip, which is required to access results beyond the first 100

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: A valid status of one of the following: \\\\\\\"scheduled\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"in progress\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"final\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"canceled\\\\\\\", or \\\\\\\"delayed\\\\\\\"

optional_parameters.name: league
optional_parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

optional_parameters.name: conference
optional_parameters.description: A conference within the specified league

api_list.name: Conferences
api_list.description: Returns a list of conferences and divisions within the specified league. Use this endpoint to obtain conference and division names to be used as parameters for other requests.

required_parameters.name: league
required_parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

api_list.name: Odds
api_list.description: Returns the odds history for a game by type.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: An odds type of one of the following: \\\"spread\\\", \\\"moneyline\\\", \\\"total\\\", or \\\"any\\\"
